article_title: Drug that was supposed to stem Kentucky's heroin epidemic creates a whole new problem
article_text: Kentucky doctors have new restrictions for prescribing Suboxone after efforts to curb pill mills created a new cash-for-pills market and a street trade for the drug designed to safely wean addicts from heroin.

article_metadata.news-keywords: kentucky, legislation, drug, abuse, controlled, substance, suboxone, pill, mill, heroin, ky
